author: Huw
title: Official Brickset review
review: The official Brickset review of this set is at http://www.brickset.com/miscellaneous/reviews/minecraft/

author: Gyir
title: Wonderful set; very true to the game!
review: This is a great set that was fun to build and play with.  My family are all fans of Minecraft, and we all thought this set was a great and fun representation of the game.  Lego did a great job with this set!

author: jakeblast
title: amazing set
review:
Now right off the bat this set is so cool,the box is so awesome,and the set itself,WOW!

Now for the pros and cons

 

            Pros

the set's box is a dirt block like in minecraft.

steve and the creeper are so awesome.

the set has so many things in it like,lave,water,etc.

 

 

            Cons

steve can not get in his house

you place steve or the creeper anywhere some of their pieces fall off.

 the end of the pros and cons.

 

 

 

I have to say this. this is one awesome set.

 

So hurry and get yourself one.

author: knightman424
title: First Cuusoo Set
review:
The first Cuusoo set available is a pretty good one. The game Minecraft is a lot like Legos, as you can build nearly anything. The first thing I noticed about the set was the box. I know it has been mentioned in other reviews, but I think it's the first box to have its demensions! The instructions are normal, but the part in the first booklet about Cuusoo is a good touch.

  The build is pretty standard, but being module makes it more fun to build. The two guys, Steve and Creeper are OK, but don't connect with the set (despite what it shows on the box). Steve has printing on the sides of the two 1x1 plates of his head, which is a first.

  Not that much playability, but it is because the people don't connect with the rest of the set. I'm sure if they did, it would be a lot more fun to play with. The set comes with lots of extra pieces, some of which are not even used in the set. It is a lot better than most of the minecraft merchendise, so if you like both minecraft and Lego, you should definantly get it.
